inclusion.criterion: Women undergoing surgical correction of pelvic organ prolapse or urinary incontinence
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unwillingness to participate in the investigation.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Plan for suprapubic catheter placement at time of surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. Has severe bulbar urethral stricture requiring surgical correction.
